FuncDef:
The mld snooping group-policy vlan command sets the range of multicast groups in VLANs that hosts can join.
The undo mld snooping group-policy command cancels the configuration. The mld snooping group-policy vlan command sets the range of multicast groups in VLANs that hosts can join. The undo mld snooping group-policy command cancels the configuration. By default, hosts can join any multicast groups. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: mld snooping group-policy { <acl6-number> | acl6-name <acl6-name> } [ version <number> ] vlan { <vlan-id1> [ to <vlan-id2> ] } &<1-10>
undo mld snooping group-policy [ { <acl6-number> | acl6-name <acl6-name> } [ version <number> ] ] [ vlan { all | { <vlan-id1> [ to <vlan-id2> ] } &<1-10> } ]
ParentView: Layer 2 100GE interface view,Layer 2 10GE interface view,Layer 2 200GE interface view,25GE-L2 view,400GE-L2 view,Layer 2 50GE interface view,Layer 2 Eth-Trunk interface view,Interface group view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of an ACL.
The value is an integer ranging from 2000 to 3999.

Specifies the name of a named ACL6.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. The name must start with a letter or digit, and cannot contain only digits.

Specifies an MLD version.
The value can be 1 or 2.

Specifies the start VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Specifies the end VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
